SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.PROD_NO) FROM TBL_PRODUCT A

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY A.PROD_INST_DATE DESC, A.PROD_NO DESC) RANK, A.PROD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME, C.BRAND_NAME, A.PROD_NAME, A.PROD_DESC, A.PROD_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT_RATE, A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT, A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT, A.PROD_INST_DATE, A.PROD_UPT_DATE, A.PROD_AVAIL_YN, A.PROD_SIZE, A.PROD_COLOR FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON (A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO)
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER ( ORDER BY A.PROD_INST_DATE DESC, A.PROD_NO DESC) RANK, A.PROD_NO, B.CATEGORY_NAME, C.BRAND_NAME, A.PROD_NAME, A.PROD_DESC, A.PROD_PRICE, A.DISCOUNT_RATE, A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT, A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT, A.PROD_INST_DATE, A.PROD_UPT_DATE, A.PROD_AVAIL_YN, A.PROD_SIZE, A.PROD_COLOR FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON (A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) WHERE A.PROD_AVAIL_YN = 'Y'

SELECT A.PROD_NO , B.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BRAND_NAME , A.PROD_NAME , A.PROD_DESC , A.DISCOUNT_RATE , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAIL_CONTENT , A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT , A. PROD_INST_DATE , A.PROD_UPT_DATE , A.PROD_AVAIL_YN , A.PROD_SIZE , A.PROD_COLOR , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(A.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO)
WHERE A.PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }

SELECT DISTINCT(A.PROD_NO) , A.PROD_PRICE , A.PROD_DETAIL_VIEW_COUNT , A.PROD_INST_DATE FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON(A.CATEGORY_NO = B.CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(A.BRAND_NO = C.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT AA.PROD_NO AS AAPNO FROM TBL_PRODUCT AA GROUP BY AA.PROD_NO) RT ON(RT.AAPNO = A.PROD_NO) WHERE A.PROD_AVAIL_YN = 'Y'
SELECT REF_PROD_NO , THUMBNAIL_PATH , SAVE_PATH FROM TBL_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACH_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_TYPE = 'THUMB_MAIN' AND REF_PROD_NO = #{ prodNo }
